description: Difference between n and the result of "Phi-summation" over unitary divisors of n.
links: Reinhard Zumkeller, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
formula: a(n)=n-Sum[Phi[u]], where GCD[u, n/u] = 1, i.e. u is unitary divisor of n.
example: Squarefree numbers are roots of a(n)=0 equation, while Min n for which a(n)=k is k^2. See also A000188, A008833.
prog: (Haskell)a055654 n = a055654_list !! (n-1)a055654_list = zipWith (-) [1..] a055653_list-- _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Mar 11 2012
author: _Labos Elemer_, Jun 07 2000
